author: Retro Game Corps
description:
After months of anticipation, the MCON controller is in its final production stage -- here is an in-depth look at this potentially disruptive mobile gaming solution.

Buy one here: https://www.ohsnap.com/RUSS10887

This was a review unit sent to me by the manufacturer.  All opinions are my own, they did not see this review ahead of time, and no money was exchanged in any way.

Ways to support this channel:
RGC merch: https://store.retrogamecorps.com
Stickers and magnets: https://www.ebay.com/str/retrogamecorpscharitystore

Ko-Fi: https://ko-fi.com/retrogamecorps

Timestamps:

10:13 paddles and bottom
11:34 the controls
16:08 pocketability
17:02 ergonomics
19:50 shoulders and triggers
22:52 detached mode
23:59 Switch mode
24:37 summar
title: The MCON Controller is Finally Here!
